data.meta_description: Bashkir State Medical University is one of the best options to study MBBS in Russia for Indian students, it offers medical education at an affordable fee structure.
data.text:
Bashkir State Medical University | BSMU | Eligibility Criteria & Admission Process

Bashkir State Medical University was established in 1932 located in Ufa, Bashkortostan, Russia. University is considered as one of the largest Medico Scientific Center in Russian Federation and it is also ranked among the top MBBS Universities in Russia. Among Indian students, this university is in demand for pursuing MBBS in Russia.

The university got a license from Ministry of Education of Russian Federation and is one of the best Medical Universities in Russia. It has more than Bashkir University has been providing specialty programs in different courses for the last 88 years. It is a member of WHO also recognized by NMC and it is considered as a center of medical and pharmaceutical science of Bashkortostan Republic.

Bashkir State Medical University Eligibility Criteria

One of the leading College in Russia for Medical education, Bashkir Medical University is open for admission and allow admission on the basis of some criteria. Applicants who apply for admission here need to qualify for NEET Exam as NEET Scorecard is required during the process. We have mentioned detailed Bashkir State Medical University Eligibility Criteria for international candidates that they need to meet otherwise their application will be rejected.

Bashkir State Medical University Admission Process

Indian candidates who planned to get admission here need to follow easy admission process, for successfully completing process they required some documents. The Documents will collect general information of candidates, applicants who want more information related to Bashkir State Medical University Admission Process can contact us. Our Abroad Admission Counsellors will review your query and brief you about the process.

Required Documents

10th Class Marksheet.

12th Class Marksheet.

NEET UG Scorecard

Original Passport.

Passport size Photographs

HIV Report

COVID-19 Report

Bashkir State Medical University Ranking

The University is MCI/ NMC Approved Medical Colleges in Russia and ranked among the top universities in the world. It is ranked 301-350 in the world university ranking declared by QS Ranking and according to the 4ICU Bashkir State Medical University Ranking is improved in the last few years which is mentioned below.

Bashkir State Medical University Ranking

COUNTRY RANKING

63rd

Bashkir State Medical University Fees Structure 2024

The University fee is low for Indian students as compared to other foreign medical universities, here below we have mentioned the Bashkir State Medical University Fee. Applicants are advised to check it before applying for admission here.

Bashkir State Medical University Courses

At Bashkir University there are over 120 programs for the level of training and over 800 advanced training programs. Bashkir State Medical University Courses for Indian candidates are available in the different specializations of medical education. The University is conducting intermediate certification of students using E-Learning and Distance Learning Technologies to prevent applicants from new coronavirus infection.

Bashkir State Medical University Hostel

Bashkir State Medical University Hostel has 6 buildings that can accommodate more than 2800 students. Indian candidates can choose rooms according to their comfort as the hostel has both separate and combined rule facilities. Applicants can get quality food and other accommodations that we have mentioned below.
